    • Constructor Detail

      • RS232Command

        public RS232Command(java.lang.String commandNumber,
            java.lang.String datas,
            byte crc)
             throws CrcException,
                    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Create a new RS232Command object (with CRC check)
        Parameters:
        commandNumber - The number of the command (an RS232CommandType)
        datas - The datas. Can be empty in some cases
        crc - The CRC as described in the docs (NMEA-0183)
        Throws:
        CrcException
        java.lang.Exception
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • RS232Command

        public RS232Command(RS232CommandType commandNumber,
            java.lang.String datas)
        Create a new RS232Command object (without CRC check).
        Parameters:
        commandNumber - The number of the command (an RS232CommandType)
        datas - The datas. Can be empty in some cases

      • RS232Command

        public RS232Command(java.lang.String chain)
             throws CrcException,
                    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Instantiates a new RS-232Command object. The parsing is automatic.
        Parameters:
        chain - The original string, as received by RS-232
        Throws:
        CrcException - Thrown if the CRC is faulty
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Can be thrown when the String does not conform with the standards.

    • Method Detail

      • sendNck

        public void sendNck(RS232 rs)
        Send a message to the PIC telling that a command was faulty
        Parameters:
        rs - The RS-232 object sending the request.

      • extractDatas

        public static java.lang.String extractDatas(java.lang.String chain)
        Extract the datas from a received String.
        Parameters:
        chain - The String that was received via RS-232
        Returns:
        The datas as a String. May be empty.

      • extractCommand

        public static RS232CommandType extractCommand(java.lang.String chain)
        Extract the command number from a received String.
        Parameters:
        chain - The String that was received via RS-232
        Returns:
        The command number as an RS232CommandType.

      • extractCrc

        public static byte extractCrc(java.lang.String chain)
        Extract the CRC from a received String..
        Parameters:
        chain - The String that was received via RS-232
        Returns:
        A byte representing the CRC
